verses.text: Unto thee do I lift up mine eyes, O thou that sittest in the heavens.
Behold, as the eyes of servants look the hand of their master, as the eyes of a maiden unto the hand of her mistress; so our eyes look the LORD our God, until he have mercy upon us.
Have mercy upon us, O LORD, have mercy upon us: for we are exceedingly filled with contempt.
Our soul is exceedingly filled with the scorning of those that are at ease, and with the contempt of the proud.
